News.headline: Match Officials Essex Senior Cup: Dagenham & Redbridge vs Southend United
News.page_title: Match Officials Essex Senior Cup: Dagenham & Redbridge vs Southend United
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials Essex Senior Cup: Daggers vs Southend United
News.short_description: Tonight's referee for the Dagenham & Redbridge Essex Senior Cup home game against Southend United has been named as Robert Whitton
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Kevin Nicholson and Joseph Gray.

Ticket will be available on the turnstiles only.

Ticket Prices:
Adults: £6
Concessions/Juniors: £3
